protocol.make_response(request, code, data=None)[source]¶
Parameters

  • request –

  • code –

  • data –

Returns

Dictionary of params

  • Example ::

    {‘action’: request.get(‘action’),’time’: request.get(‘time’),’data’: data,’code’: code}

protocol.validate_request(raw)[source]¶
Parameters

raw – raw client request

Returns

Bool value - validation solution

  • Example

    {'action': 'echo', 'time': ''}
